tool.name: Scater: t-SNE plot
tool.description: Produces a t-SNE plot of two components
tool.command: Rscript '$__tool_directory__/scater-plot-tsne.R' -i '$input_loom' #if str($colour_by).strip(): --colour-by '$colour_by' #end if #if str($size_by).strip(): --size-by '$size_by' #end if #if str($shape_by).strip(): --shape-by '$shape_by' #end if -o '$output_plot'

param.name: colour_by
param.label: Feature (from annotation file) to colour t-SNE plot points by
param.help: The values represented in this options should be categorical

param.name: size_by
param.label: Feature (from annotation file) to size t-SNE plot points by
param.help: The values represented in this options should be numerical and not categorical

param.name: shape_by
param.label: Feature (from annotation file) to shape t-SNE plot points by
param.help: The values represented in this options should be categorical

tool.help: Creates a t-SNE plot of a normalised SingleCellLoomExperiment object using Scater.
